trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sleepless Reveler
entries: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The satyr makes three ram attacks or three shortbow attacks.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hail of Arrows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The satyr fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
